SELECT P.PRODUCT_ID AS productId, P.CATEGORY_ID AS categoryId, P.PRODUCT_NAME AS name, P.BRAND_NAME AS brandName, P.PRICE AS price, P.STOCK_QUANTITY AS stockQuantity, P.DESCRIPTION AS description, P.STATUS AS status, P.IMAGE_URL AS imageUrl,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WISHLIST W WHERE W.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID AND W.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}) AS wished
FROM PRODUCT P
AND P.CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId}
ORDER BY P.PRODUCT_ID DESC

SELECT PRODUCT_ID AS productId, CATEGORY_ID AS categoryId, PRODUCT_NAME AS name, BRAND_NAME AS brandName, PRICE AS price, STOCK_QUANTITY AS stockQuantity, DESCRIPTION AS description, STATUS AS status, IMAGE_URL AS imageUrl FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT PRODUCT_ID AS productId, PRODUCT_NAME AS name, BRAND_NAME AS brandName, PRICE AS price, IMAGE_URL AS imageUrl, VIEW_COUNT AS viewCount FROM PRODUCT ORDER BY VIEW_COUNT DESC, PRODUCT_ID DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limit}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT PRODUCT_ID AS productId, PRODUCT_NAME AS name, BRAND_NAME AS brandName, PRICE AS price, IMAGE_URL AS imageUrl, UPDATED_AT AS updatedAt FROM PRODUCT ORDER BY UPDATED_AT DESC, PRODUCT_ID DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limit}
